ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Patient2NotApplicable__c=TRUE, NOT(ISNEW()), OR( NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Patient2EnrolledInMedicalServicesPlan__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Patient2DateOfBirth__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Paitent2GivenName__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Patient2Surname__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Patient2MiddleName__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Patient2PersonalHealthNumber__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Patient2Address__CountryCode__s))), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Patient2Address__StateCode__s))), NOT(ISBLANK(Patient2Address__City__s)), NOT(ISBLANK(Patient2Address__Street__s)), NOT(ISBLANK(Patient2Address__PostalCode__s)), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Pat2PreviouslyParticipatedInIVFProgram__c))), NOT(ISBLANK(Text(Patient2IsThePatientFromOutOfCountry__c))) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Patient2 Details Should not be filled if it is not applicable
